concept.description: Labels all UML elements of type "uml:Package" with "Package".
concept.cypher: MATCH (package:UML:Element{type:"uml:Package"}) SET package:Package RETURN count(package) as Packages

concept.description: Labels all UML elements of type "uml:Component" with "Component".
concept.cypher: MATCH (component:UML:Element{type:"uml:Component"}) SET component:Component RETURN count(component) as Components

concept.description: Labels all UML elements of type "uml:Property" with "Property".
concept.cypher: MATCH (property:UML:Element{type:"uml:Property"}) SET property:Property RETURN count(property) as Properties

concept.description: Labels all UML elements of type "uml:Usage" with "Usage".
concept.cypher: MATCH (usage:UML:Element{type:"uml:Usage"}) SET usage:Usage RETURN count(usage) as Usages

concept.description: Labels all UML elements of type "uml:Association" with "Association".
concept.cypher: MATCH (association:UML:Element{type:"uml:Association"}) SET association:Association RETURN count(association) as Associations

concept.description: Labels all UML elements of type "uml:Dependency" with "Dependency".
concept.cypher: MATCH (dependency:UML:Element{type:"uml:Dependency"}) SET dependency:Dependency WITH dependency MATCH (dependency)-[:HAS_CLIENT]->(client:UML:Element), (dependency)-[:HAS_SUPPLIER]->(supplier:UML:Element) MERGE (client)-[hasDependency:HAS_DEPENDENCY]->(supplier) RETURN count(hasDependency) as Dependencies
MATCH (usage:UML:Usage), (usage)-[:HAS_CLIENT]->(client:UML:Element), (usage)-[:HAS_SUPPLIER]->(supplier:UML:Element) MERGE (client)-[uses:USES]->(supplier) RETURN count(uses) as Uses

MATCH (element:UML:Element), (element)-[:HAS_CHILD]->(provided:UML:Interface:Provided) MERGE (element)-[providesInterface:PROVIDES_INTERFACE]->(provided) RETURN count(providesInterface) as ProvidesInterfaces

MATCH (element:UML:Element), (element)-[:HAS_CHILD]->(required:UML:Interface:Required) MERGE (element)-[requiresInterface:REQUIRES_INTERFACE]->(required) RETURN count(requiresInterface) as RequiresInterfaces
